long_description: The INNO Two Kayak Rooftop carrier hauls two kayaks on their sides. Simply adjust the cradles to the appropriate widths, slide boats onto the rack, and secure over the top with the straps. Universal mounting hardware mounts to square, round and most factory crossbars. Low-height design is garage friendly; carrier folds down when not in use. The INNO Two Kayak Rooftop carrier includes two sets of cradles to accomodate two kayaks, plus pads and straps to tie-down your boats.
short_description: The INNO Two Kayak Rooftop carrier hauls two kayaks on their sides. Simply adjust the cradles to the appropriate widths, slide boats onto the rack, and secure over the top with the straps.
